Function Documentation

int uncl_msg_alloc ( uncl_msg_t *  msg,
unsigned int  nbytes 
)

Allocate a message buffer.

Parameters:
msg Address of the location in which to allocate the message.
nbytes Size of the buffer in bytes.
Returns:
0 on success, -1 on error.

void* uncl_msg_data ( uncl_msg_t  msg  ) 

Get a pointer to the data section of an allocated message.

Parameters:
msg A message that has already been allocated.
Returns:
A pointer to the message data on success or NULL on failure.

void uncl_msg_set_type ( uncl_msg_t  msg,
int  msg_type 
)

Set the message type.

The message type is used as a unique identifier for distingushing between various message types that may be passed across the socket. The message types are defined by the user.

Parameters:
msg Message that we will be modifiying.
msg_type The user defined message type.

int uncl_msg_get_type ( uncl_msg_t  msg  ) 

Get the message type.

The message type is used as a unique identifier for distingushing between various message types that may be passed across the socket. The message types are defined by the user.

Parameters:
msg Message that we will be modifiying.
Returns:
The user defined message type.

int uncl_msg_set_size ( uncl_msg_t  msg,
unsigned int  data_size 
)

Set the message size to match the amount of data we want to send.

Parameters:
msg Message that we will be modifiying.
data_size Size of the data portion of the message.
Returns:
0 on success, -1 on error.

int uncl_msg_read ( uncl_socket_t  usock,
uncl_msg_t  msg 
)

Read a message from a UDP socket.

Parameters:
usock An initialized UDP network communications library socket.
msg Message buffer to read into.
Returns:
0 on sucess, -1 on failure.

char *  hostname,
int  port 
)

Open a connection to a UDP server.

Parameters:
usock UDP network communications library socket
hostname Server hostname or IP address.
port Server port number. parameters.
Returns:
0 on success, -1 on error.

int uncl_server ( uncl_socket_t *  usock,
int  port 
)

Create a UDP server.

Parameters:
usock UDP network communications library socket

Returns:
0 on success, -1 on error.

Get a count of the number of successfully read messages.

Returns:

Get the number of UDP network communications library errors for this socket.

Parameters:
usock UDP network communications library socket.
Returns:
